label: 荘園公領制
本: Capital and Countryside in Japan, 300-1180:  Japanese Historians Interpreted in English . Cornell University East Asia Program . 2006
見出し読み: しょうえんこうりょうせい
説明文: the “estate-and-public-land tenurial system” of late Heian times. The term is a modern historiographical one for the system comprised of estates and the public domain. An alternative appellation is the shôen kokugaryôsei 荘園国衙領制.
